replies.body:
{{champion:432}} *confused jingles*
{{champion:63}} ....maybe they meant Braum
{{champion:201}}  Leave Bruam out of this
{{champion:236}} Have either of you seen a thresh? It stole my wife.
{{champion:432}} *explaining jingles*
{{champion:63}} OHH! BURN!
{{champion:236}} ...You have no idea what he's saying do you?
{{champion:412}} HaaaaHaaaaHaaaHaaaHaaaaHaaaa
{{champion:236}} There you are!.... Can I have my wife back?
{{champion:412}} No
{{champion:236}} ....
{{champion:201}} It's okay. You'll get him next time.
{{champion:432}} _approving jingles_

Think about which one is more likely to hard carry a game

> {{champion:432}} It's chime for you to die
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bg92QpjRcJk
But is it chime for me to fly?

If it's unknowable
It's Bard

Since nobody's done it yet, I'm just going to put the inevitable "wheres solo q" question that you'll ignore, mostly because that's not even your department:


wheres solo q?


EDIT: You know, I thought that the sarcasm was obvious enough, Apparently not

How can you be downvoted so much when the sarcasm was so strong and obvious.

Don't worry, I still like you. Take my humble +1.
I am guessing some people read like half of it like I did and went for the downvote button then read the other half and changed my vote to up.
You probably want to put a "Kappa :P" at the end of that if you don't want to see to Tyler1's fanboy record for downvotes. Just a thought >.<
I thought I was being sarcastic enough. Apparently not
Always that one asshole.
dead. So SHUT UP!

but for real now...

where is soloq?
Bards nickname has been Brad since release, I've never seen anyone in game get confused when you have both on a team
The joke is when someone mistypes either Brand's or Bard's name, and it could be either of the two champs.
If they meant Brand and wrote Bard, disregard everything they're saying
Brad and Susan best carries.
You mispelled "Mariah".
they probably meant Brat Pitt Carry
#*CHIMS IN JUNGO INTENSIFY*
